verses.name: Luke 8:32
verses.text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain: and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them. And he suffered them.

verses.name: Luke 8:33
verses.text: Then went the devils out of the man, and entered into the swine: and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake, and were choked.

verses.name: Luke 8:34
verses.text: When they that fed them saw what was done, they fled, and went and told it in the city and in the country.
